name: ORD_MOD_DATA
description: This table contains the modality data related to the performing imaging order.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MODALITY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the imaging modality data record (IMY) which contains imaging information related to this order.
